name: Default
description: The Vee3 default app that should load if no app is specified. This is in effect the launch pad (store?) for all other apps.

manifest.//: probably don't want this to be cached and only online i.e. not pinnable

scripts.tag: git add . && git commit -m "Checking in latest" && npm version patch && git add . && git commit -m "Checking in version patch git push"
